From stdpp Require Import prelude.
From Coq Require Import Streams FunctionalExtensionality FinFun Eqdep.
From VLSM Require Import Lib.Preamble Lib.ListExtras Lib.StdppListSet Lib.StreamExtras.
From VLSM Require Import Core.VLSM Core.Plans Core.VLSMProjections.

VLSM Composition

This module provides Coq definitions for composite VLSMs and their projections to components. 
Section VLSM_composition.
Let us fix a type for messages, and an index type for the VLSM components such that equality on index is decidable. 
  Context {message : Type}
          {index : Type}
          {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
          (IM : index -> VLSM message)
          .

  Section composite_type.

The type of a composite VLSM

Let IM be a family of VLSMs indexed by index. Note that all VLSMs share the same type of messages.
A composite_state is an indexed family of states, yielding for each index n a state of type IT n, the VLSMType corresponding to machine n.
Note that the composite_state type is the dependent product type of the family of state types corresponding to each index. 
    Definition _composite_state : Type :=
      forall n : index, vstate (IM n).
A composite_label is a pair between an index N and a label of IT n.
Note that the composite_label type is the dependent sum of the family of types [@label _ (IT n) | n <- index]. 
    Definition _composite_label
      : Type
      := sigT (fun n => vlabel (IM n)).

    Definition composite_type : VLSMType message :=
      {| state := _composite_state
       ; label := _composite_label
      |}.

    Definition composite_state := @state message composite_type.
    Definition composite_label := @label message composite_type.
    Definition composite_transition_item : Type := @transition_item message composite_type.
A very useful operation on composite_states is updating the state corresponding to a component: 
    Definition state_update
               (s : composite_state)
               (i : index)
               (si : vstate (IM i))
               (j : index)
      : vstate (IM j)
      :=
      match decide (j = i) with
      | left e => eq_rect_r (fun i => vstate (IM i)) si e
      | _ => s j
      end.
The next few results describe several properties of the state_update operation. 
    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
s: composite_state
i: index
si: vstate (IM i)
j: index
Hneq: j ‚â† i
state_update s i si j = s j

j: index

state_update s i si j = s j

match decide (j = i) with
| left e =>
    eq_rect_r (Œª i : index, vstate (IM i)) si e
| right _ => s j
end = s j

s j = s j
 reflexivity.
    Qed.

end = si

 reflexivity.
    Qed.

    Qed.
  End composite_type.

  Section composite_sig.

The signature of a composite VLSM

Assume an non-empty index type and let IT be an indexed family of VLSMTypes, and for each index i, let IS i be a VLSMSignature of type IT i.
A composite_state has the initial_state_property if all of its component states have the initial_state_property in the corresponding component signature. 
    Definition composite_initial_state_prop
               (s : composite_state)
      : Prop
      :=
        forall n : index, vinitial_state_prop (IM n) (s n).

    Definition composite_initial_state
      := sig composite_initial_state_prop.

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
composite_initial_state

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
composite_initial_state

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
composite_initial_state_prop
  (Œª n : index, `(vs0 (IM n)))

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
i: index
vinitial_state_prop (IM i) (`(vs0 (IM i)))
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
i: index
s: state
Hs: initial_state_prop s
vinitial_state_prop (IM i) (`(s ‚Üæ Hs))
 assumption.
    Defined.

    Global Instance composite_initial_state_inh : Inhabited composite_initial_state :=
      {| inhabitant := composite_s0 |}.
A message has the initial_message_property in the composite_signature iff it has the initial_message_property in any of the component signatures. 
    Definition composite_initial_message_prop (m : message) : Prop
      :=
        exists (n : index) (mi : vinitial_message (IM n)), proj1_sig mi = m.

    Definition option_composite_initial_message_prop : option message -> Prop
      := from_option composite_initial_message_prop True.

    Definition composite_sig
      : VLSMSign composite_type
      :=
        {|   initial_state_prop := composite_initial_state_prop
           ; initial_message_prop := composite_initial_message_prop
        |}.
We can always "lift" state sj from component j to a composite state by updating an initial composite state, say s0, to sj on component j. 
    Definition lift_to_composite_label
      (j : index)
      (lj : vlabel (IM j))
      : composite_label
      := existT j lj.

    Definition lift_to_composite_state
      (j : index)
      (sj : vstate (IM j))
      (s0X := proj1_sig composite_s0)
      : composite_state
      := state_update s0X j sj.

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
item: vtransition_item (IM j)
s0X:= `composite_s0: composite_state
transition_item

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
item: vtransition_item (IM j)
s0X:= `composite_s0: composite_state
transition_item

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
l: label
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
s0X:= `composite_s0: composite_state
transition_item

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
l: label
input: option message
destination: state
output: option message
s0X:= `composite_s0: composite_state
label

option message

state

 exact (existT j l).

 exact output.
    Defined.

    Definition lift_to_composite_state'
      (s : composite_state)
      (j : index)
      (sj : vstate (IM j))
      : composite_state
      := state_update s j sj.

Composite versions for plan_item and plan. 
    Definition composite_plan_item := @plan_item _ composite_type.
    Definition composite_plan := list composite_plan_item.

    Defined.

  End composite_sig.

  Section sec_composite_vlsm.

Constrained VLSM composition

Assume an non-empty index type, let IT be an indexed family of VLSMTypes, and for each index i, let IS i be a VLSMSignature of type IT i and IM i be a VLSM of signature IS i.
The transition function for the composite_vlsm is defined as follows takes a transition in the VLSM corresponding to the given composite_label and returnes the produced message together with the state updated on that component: 
    Definition composite_transition
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : composite_state * option message
      :=
      let (s, om) := som in
      let (i, li) := l in
      let (si', om') := vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
      (state_update s i si',  om').
Given a composite_label (i, li) and a composite_state-message pair (s, om), composite_validity is defined as validity in the ith component IM i. 
    Definition composite_valid
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : Prop
      :=
      let (s, om) := som in
      let (i, li) := l in
      vvalid (IM i) li (s i, om).
A constraint for a composite VLSM is a validity condition defined directly on composite_labels and composite_states, thus being able to impose a global condition.
constrained_composite_validity interposes such a constraint on top of the composite_validity. 
    Definition constrained_composite_valid
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      :=
      composite_valid l som /\ constraint l som.

    Definition composite_vlsm_machine
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      : VLSMClass composite_sig
      :=
      {|  transition := composite_transition
       ;  valid := constrained_composite_valid constraint
      |}.

    Definition composite_vlsm
      (constraint : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      : VLSM message
      := mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_machine constraint).

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
l: composite_label
s, s': composite_state
om, om': option message
Ht: input_valid_transition
  (composite_vlsm constraint) l 
  (s, om) (s', om')
i: index
Hi: i ‚â† projT1 l
s' i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
l: composite_label
s, s': composite_state
om, om': option message
Ht: input_valid_transition
  (composite_vlsm constraint) l 
  (s, om) (s', om')
i: index
Hi: i ‚â† projT1 l
s' i = s i

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
l: composite_label
s, s': composite_state
om, om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
i: index
Hi: i ‚â† projT1 l
s' i = s i
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
l: composite_label
s, s': composite_state
om, om': option message
Ht: (let (i, li) := l in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, om) in
 (state_update s i si', om')) = 
(s', om')
i: index
Hi: i ‚â† projT1 l
s' i = s i
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
il: index
l: vlabel (IM il)
s, s': composite_state
om, om': option message
Ht: (let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) in
 (state_update s il si', om')) = 
(s', om')
i: index
Hi: i ‚â† projT1 (existT il l)
s' i = s i

message, index: Type

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
il: index
l: vlabel (IM il)

om, om': option message
si': state
omi': option message
Ht': vtransition (IM il) l (s il, om) = (si', omi')
Ht: (state_update s il si', omi') = (s', om')
H0: state_update s il si' = s'
H1: omi' = om'
state_update s il si' il = (si', om').1
 apply state_update_eq.
    Qed.
Composite versions for the generic _apply_plan-related definitions and results. 
    Definition composite_apply_plan := (@_apply_plan _ composite_type composite_transition).
    Definition composite_apply_plan_app
      (start : composite_state)
      (a a' : list plan_item)
      : composite_apply_plan start (a ++ a') =
        let (aitems, afinal) := composite_apply_plan start a in
        let (a'items, a'final) := composite_apply_plan afinal a' in
         (aitems ++ a'items, a'final)
      := (@_apply_plan_app _ composite_type composite_transition start a a').
    Definition composite_apply_plan_last
      (start : composite_state)
      (a : list plan_item)
      (after_a := composite_apply_plan start a)
      : finite_trace_last start (fst after_a) = snd after_a
      := (@_apply_plan_last _ composite_type composite_transition start a).
    Definition composite_trace_to_plan := (@_trace_to_plan _ composite_type).

sj: vstate (IM j)
Hinitj: vinitial_state_prop (IM j) sj
composite_initial_state_prop
  (lift_to_composite_state j sj)

composite_initial_state_prop
  (lift_to_composite_state j sj)

Free VLSM composition

The free_constraint is defined to be True for all inputs. Thus, the free_composite_vlsm is the composite_vlsm using the free_constraint. 
    Definition free_constraint
      (l : composite_label)
      (som : composite_state * option message)
      : Prop
      := True.

    Definition free_composite_vlsm : VLSM message
      := composite_vlsm free_constraint.

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
VLSM_full_projection (IM j) free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_label j)
  (lift_to_composite_state j)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
VLSM_full_projection (IM j) free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_label j)
  (lift_to_composite_state j)

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
l: label
s: state
om: option message
H: vvalid (IM j) l (s, om)
vvalid free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_label j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, om)
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H: vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s', om')
vtransition free_composite_vlsm
  (lift_to_composite_label j l)
  (lift_to_composite_state j s, om) =
(lift_to_composite_state j s', om')

  (lift_to_composite_state j s)

 apply state_update_twice.

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
m: message
H: vinitial_message_prop (IM j) m
`(m ‚Üæ H) = m
 reflexivity.
    Qed.

    Definition lift_to_composite_finite_trace j
      : list (vtransition_item (IM j)) -> list composite_transition_item
      := VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project (lift_to_composite_vlsm_full_projection j).

    Definition lift_to_composite_finite_trace_last j
      := VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_last (lift_to_composite_vlsm_full_projection j).

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_incl (composite_vlsm constraint)
  free_composite_vlsm

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_incl (composite_vlsm constraint)
  free_composite_vlsm

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
om: option message
H: vvalid
  (mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_machine constraint)) l
  (s, om)
vvalid
  (mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_machine free_constraint))
  (id l) (id s, om)

      split; [apply H|exact I].
    Qed.

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_incl
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm constraint) P)
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     free_composite_vlsm)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
P: message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_incl
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm constraint) P)
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     free_composite_vlsm)

      apply basic_VLSM_strong_incl; cbv; intuition.
    Qed.

    
message, index: Type

  (composite_vlsm constraint) s om

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
s: state
om: option message
valid_state_message_prop (composite_vlsm constraint) s
  om
‚Üí valid_state_message_prop free_composite_vlsm s om

      apply (VLSM_incl_valid_state_message (constraint_free_incl constraint)); intro; intros; assumption.
    Qed.

    Section sec_constraint_subsumption.

Constraint subsumption

A constraint1 is subsumed by constraint2 if constraint1 is stronger than constraint2 for any input. 
    Definition strong_constraint_subsumption
        (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
        :=
        forall (l : composite_label) (som : composite_state * option message),
          constraint1 l som -> constraint2 l som.
A weaker version of strong_constraint_subsumption requiring input_validity w.r.t. pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm as a precondition for the subsumption property.
This definition is useful in proving VLSM_inclusions between VLSMs pre-loaded with all messages (Lemma preloaded_constraint_subsumption_incl).
Although there are currently no explicit cases for its usage, it might be more useful than the strong_constraint_subsumption property in cases where proving constraint subsumption relies on the state being valid and/or the message being valid. 
    Definition preloaded_constraint_subsumption
        (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
        :=
        forall (l : composite_label) (som : state * option message),
            input_valid (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (composite_vlsm constraint1)) l som ->
            constraint2 l som.
A weaker version of preloaded_constraint_subsumption requiring input_validity as a precondition for the subsumption property.
This definition is usually useful in proving VLSM_inclusions between regular VLSMs (Lemma constraint_subsumption_incl).
It is more useful than the strong_constraint_subsumption property in cases where proving constraint subsumption relies on the state/message being valid and/or the message being valid (e.g., Lemma Fixed_incl_StrongFixed). 
    Definition input_valid_constraint_subsumption
        (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
        :=
        forall (l : composite_label) (som : composite_state * option message),
          input_valid (composite_vlsm constraint1) l som -> constraint2 l som.

    Context
      (constraint1 constraint2 : composite_label -> composite_state * option message -> Prop)
      (X1 := composite_vlsm constraint1)
      (X2 := composite_vlsm constraint2)
      .
Let X1, X2 be two compositions of the same family of VLSMs but with constraints constraint1 and constraint2, respectively. Further assume that constraint1 is subsumed by constraint2.
We will show that X1 is trace-included into X2 by applying Lemma basic_VLSM_incl 
(* begin hide *)
    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint1, constraint2: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X1:= composite_vlsm constraint1: VLSM message
X2:= composite_vlsm constraint2: VLSM message
Hsubsumption: input_valid_constraint_subsumption
  constraint1 constraint2
l: label
s: state
om: option message
Hv: input_valid X1 l (s, om)
vvalid X2 l (s, om)

vvalid X2 l (s, om)

 assumption.
    Qed.

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

  ‚Üí Prop

om: option message

l: label

s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHps1: valid_state_message_prop X2 s _om
IHHps2: valid_state_message_prop X2 _s om
valid_state_message_prop X2 s' om'

valid_state_message_prop X2 s om
 apply (valid_initial_state_message X2);assumption.

        split;[|split];[exists _om|exists _s|];assumption.
    Qed.

 apply preloaded_constraint_subsumption_input_valid; assumption.

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint1, constraint2: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X1:= composite_vlsm constraint1: VLSM message
X2:= composite_vlsm constraint2: VLSM message
Hpre_subsumption: preloaded_constraint_subsumption
  constraint1 constraint2
input_valid_constraint_subsumption constraint1
  constraint2

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint1, constraint2: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X1:= composite_vlsm constraint1: VLSM message
X2:= composite_vlsm constraint2: VLSM message
Hpre_subsumption: preloaded_constraint_subsumption
  constraint1 constraint2
l: composite_label
som: (composite_state * option message)%type
Hv: input_valid (composite_vlsm constraint1) l som
constraint2 l som

  ‚Üí Prop

  constraint1 constraint2

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm constraint1)) l som

  ‚Üí Prop

‚Üí input_valid
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (composite_vlsm constraint1)) l (c, o)

      apply (VLSM_incl_input_valid (vlsm_incl_pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (composite_vlsm constraint1))).
    Qed.

      apply (VLSM_incl_can_emit (preloaded_constraint_subsumption_incl Hpre_subsumption)).
    Qed.

(* end hide *)
    End sec_constraint_subsumption.

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     free_composite_vlsm)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop
preloaded_constraint_subsumption constraint
  free_constraint

      intro; intros; exact I.
    Qed.

    (* TODO(traiansf): There are many places where, because the lemma below
      was missing, it was either reproved locally, or multiple VLSM_incl_
      lemmas were used to achieve a similar result. It would be nice to
      find those usages and use this lemma instad.
    *)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label
‚Üí composite_state * option message ‚Üí Prop

        (mk_vlsm (composite_vlsm_machine constraint))))
  (mk_vlsm
     (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm_machine
        free_composite_vlsm))
 apply preloaded_constraint_free_incl.
    Qed.

     (lift_to_composite_state j s j, om) in
 (state_update (lift_to_composite_state j s) j si',
 om')) = (lift_to_composite_state j s', om')

message, index: Type

    Qed.

l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H: vtransition (IM j) l (s, om) = (s', om')
(let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM j) l
     (lift_to_composite_state j s j, om) in
 (state_update (lift_to_composite_state j s) j si',
 om')) = (lift_to_composite_state j s', om')

  (state_update (state_update s j sj') j si)
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
j: index
si: vstate (IM j)
Hsi: vinitial_state_prop (IM j) si
lj: vlabel (IM j)
om: option message
s: state
Hps: valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop free_composite_vlsm om
Hv: vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj': state
omj': option message
Htj: vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Hs: valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s j si)
valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s j si)
 assumption.

lj: vlabel (IM j)

s: state

sj': state
omj': option message
Htj: vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
Hs: valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si)
n: i ‚â† j
valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s j sj') i si)

    (s', om')

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
i: index
si: vstate (IM i)
Hsi: vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j: index
lj: vlabel (IM j)
om: option message
s: state

_s: state

  om

sj': state
omj': option message
Htj: vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om: option message
Hs: valid_state_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si) _om
n: i ‚â† j
n': j ‚â† i
Hgen: ‚àÄ (s' : _composite_state) 
  (om' : option message),
  (let (si', om'0) :=
     vtransition (IM j) lj
       (state_update s i si j, om) in
   (state_update (state_update s i si) j si',
   om'0)) = (s', om')
  ‚Üí valid_state_message_prop
      free_composite_vlsm s' om'
valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj')

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
i: index
si: vstate (IM i)
Hsi: vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j: index
lj: vlabel (IM j)

_s: _composite_state

  om

_om: option message

  (state_update s i si) _om
n: i ‚â† j
n': j ‚â† i
Hgen: ‚àÄ (s' : _composite_state) 
  (om' : option message),
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj',
  omj') = (s', om')
  ‚Üí valid_state_message_prop
      free_composite_vlsm s' om'
valid_state_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj') ?Goal
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
i: index
si: vstate (IM i)
Hsi: vinitial_state_prop (IM i) si
j: index
lj: vlabel (IM j)
om: option message
s: _composite_state
Hps: valid_state_prop free_composite_vlsm s
_s: _composite_state
Hom: valid_state_message_prop free_composite_vlsm _s
  om
Hv: vvalid (IM j) lj (s j, om)
sj': state
omj': option message
Htj: vtransition (IM j) lj (s j, om) = (sj', omj')
_om: option message
Hs: valid_state_message_prop free_composite_vlsm
  (state_update s i si) _om
n: i ‚â† j
n': j ‚â† i
Hgen: ‚àÄ (s' : _composite_state) 
  (om' : option message),
  (state_update (state_update s i si) j sj',
  omj') = (s', om')
  ‚Üí valid_state_message_prop
      free_composite_vlsm s' om'
(state_update (state_update s i si) j sj', omj') =
(state_update (state_update s i si) j sj', ?Goal)
 reflexivity.
    Qed.
  End sec_composite_vlsm.

End VLSM_composition.
These basic projection lemmas relate the valid_state_prop and input_valid_transition of a composite VLSM back to those conditions holding over projections to individual components of the state.
Because the composition may have validly produced messages that are not valid for an individual component (by interaction between components), We cannot just use properties valid_state_message_prop (IM i) or input_valid_transition (IM i). For simplicity these lemmas use pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i).
This does not precisely reflect the set of messages and transitions that can actually be seen in projections of transitions of the composite VLSM, but seems to be the best we can do with a result type that doesn't mention the other components or the composition constraint of the composite.
Later in this file a composite_constrained_projection_vlsm is defined that shares the states of IM i which is more precise. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i: index
valid_state_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  s
‚Üí valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i: index
valid_state_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  s
‚Üí valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
s: vstate (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
i: index
om: option message
Hproto: valid_state_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s om
valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i)) (s i)

  
message, index: Type

constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s om
preloaded_valid_state_prop (IM i) (s i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
s: state
_om: option message
Hproto1: valid_state_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s
  _om
_s: state
om: option message
Hproto2: valid_state_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) _s
  om
l: label
Hv: valid l (s, om)
s': state
om': option message
Ht: transition l (s, om) = (s', om')
IHHproto1: preloaded_valid_state_prop (IM i) (s i)
IHHproto2: preloaded_valid_state_prop (IM i) (_s i)
preloaded_valid_state_prop (IM i) (s' i)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
s: state
Hs: initial_state_prop s
om: option message
Hom: option_initial_message_prop om
preloaded_valid_state_prop (IM i) (s i)
 
message, index: Type

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
i: index
s: state
Hs: initial_state_prop s
om: option message
Hom: option_initial_message_prop om
initial_state_prop (s i)

    apply (Hs i).

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (im : option message) (s' : state) 
  (om : option message),
  composite_transition IM l (s, im) = (s', om)
  ‚Üí vtransition (IM (projT1 l)) (projT2 l)
      (s (projT1 l), im) = (s' (projT1 l), om)


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
‚àÄ (l : label) (s : state) (im : option message) (s' : state) 
  (om : option message),
  composite_transition IM l (s, im) = (s', om)
  ‚Üí vtransition (IM (projT1 l)) (projT2 l)
      (s (projT1 l), im) = (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
H: composite_transition IM l (s, im) = (s', om)
vtransition (IM (projT1 l)) (projT2 l)
  (s (projT1 l), im) = (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
H: composite_transition IM (existT x v) (s, im) =
(s', om)
vtransition (IM x) v (s x, im) = (s' x, om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
H: (let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM x) v (s x, im) in
 (state_update IM s x si', om')) = 
(s', om)
vtransition (IM x) v (s x, im) = (s' x, om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
s0: state
o: option message
H: (state_update IM s x s0, o) = (s', om)
(s0, o) = (s' x, om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
s0: state
o: option message
H: (state_update IM s x s0, o) = (s', om)
H1: state_update IM s x s0 = s'
H2: o = om
(s0, om) = (state_update IM s x s0 x, om)

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
s0: state
o: option message
H: (state_update IM s x s0, o) = (s', om)
H1: state_update IM s x s0 = s'
H2: o = om
s0 = state_update IM s x s0 x

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
s0: state
o: option message
H: (state_update IM s x s0, o) = (s', om)
H1: state_update IM s x s0 = s'
H2: o = om
s0 = s0

  reflexivity.
Qed.


message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om)
‚Üí input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
    (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)


message, V: Type

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s, im)
  (s', om)
‚Üí input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
    (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
Hptrans: input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s, im) (s', om)
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

  
message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
l: label
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
Hpvalid: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s, im)
Htrans: transition l (s, im) = (s', om)
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s (projT1 l), im) (s' (projT1 l), om)

i: V
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
j: V
lj: vlabel (IM j)
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
Hpvalid: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  (existT j lj) (s, im)
s0: state
o: option message
n: i ‚â† j
s i = s i

    reflexivity.
Qed.


V: Type
i: V
message: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
l: vlabel X
s: state
im: option message
s': state
om: option message
input_valid_transition X l (s, im) (s', om)
‚Üí s i = s' i
  ‚à® (‚àÉ li : (Œª n : V, vlabel (IM n)) i,
       l = existT i li
       ‚àß input_valid_transition
           (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
           li (s i, im) (s' i, om))

           (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM i))
           li (s i, im) (s' i, om))

  apply input_valid_transition_preloaded_project_any.
Qed.
If a message can be emitted by a composition, then it can be emited by one of the components. 
message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
m: message
Hemit: can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  m
‚àÉ j : V,
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j))
    m

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

m: message
Hemit: can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X)
  m
‚àÉ j : V,
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j))
    m

  can_produce
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) s m
‚àÉ j : V,
  can_emit (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM j))
    m

    m

message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V

  ‚Üí Prop

oim: option message

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l
  (s1, oim) (s2, Some m)
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
  (projT2 l) (s1 (projT1 l), oim)
  (s2 (projT1 l), Some m)

  
message, V: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision V
IM: V ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
m: message
s2, s1: state
oim: option message
l: label
input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm X) l (s1, oim)
  (s2, Some m)
‚Üí input_valid_transition
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (IM (projT1 l)))
    (projT2 l) (s1 (projT1 l), oim)
    (s2 (projT1 l), Some m)
 apply input_valid_transition_preloaded_project_active.
Qed.

Section binary_free_composition.

Free composition of two VLSMs

This serves an example of how composition can be built, but is also being used in defining the byzantine_trace_properties.
This instantiates the regular composition using the bool type as an index. 
  Context
    {message : Type}
    (M1 M2 : VLSM message)
    .

  Definition binary_index : Set := bool.

  Definition first : binary_index := true.
  Definition second : binary_index := false.

  Global Instance binary_index_dec :  EqDecision binary_index := _.
  Global Instance binary_index_inhabited : Inhabited binary_index
    :=
    populate first.

  Definition binary_IM
    (i : binary_index)
    : VLSM message
    :=
    match i with
    | true => M1
    | false => M2
    end.

  Definition binary_free_composition
    : VLSM message
    := free_composite_vlsm binary_IM.

End binary_free_composition.

Section composite_decidable_initial_message.

Composite decidable initial message

Here we show that if the initial_message_property is decidable for every component, then it is decidable for a finite composition as well. 
Context
  {message : Type}
  {index : Type}
  {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  {index_listing : list index}
  (finite_index : Listing index_listing).


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hdec_init: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
decidable_initial_messages_prop (composite_sig IM)


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hdec_init: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
decidable_initial_messages_prop (composite_sig IM)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hdec_init: ‚àÄ i : index,
  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
m: message
Decision (initial_message_prop m)
 
message, index: Type

IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing

  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
m: message
Decision (composite_initial_message_prop IM m)

  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
m: message
Decision
  (‚àÉ (n : index) (mi : vinitial_message (IM n)),
     `mi = m)

  (Œª i : index, vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m)

`(m ‚Üæ Hm) = m
 reflexivity.

vinitial_message_prop (IM i) m

 assumption.

message, index: Type

  vdecidable_initial_messages_prop (IM i)
m: message

 apply Hdec_init.
Qed.

End composite_decidable_initial_message.

Section composite_plan_properties.

  Context {message : Type}
          {index : Type}
          {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
          (IM :index -> VLSM message)
          (Free := free_composite_vlsm IM)
          .

Composite Plan Properties

The following results concern facts about applying a plan Free P to a vstate Free s', knowing its effects on a different vstate Free s which shares some relevant features with s'. 
  (* A transition on component <<i>> is [input_valid] from <<s'>> if it is
     [input_valid] from <<s>> and their <<i>>'th components are equal. *)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
Hiv: input_valid Free l (s, input)
input_valid Free l (s', input)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
Hiv: input_valid Free l (s, input)
input_valid Free l (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
Hiv: valid_state_prop Free s
‚àß option_valid_message_prop Free input
  ‚àß valid l (s, input)
valid_state_prop Free s'
‚àß option_valid_message_prop Free input
  ‚àß valid l (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: valid l (s, input)
valid l (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: constrained_composite_valid IM
  (free_constraint IM) l 
  (s, input)
constrained_composite_valid IM (free_constraint IM) l
  (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: composite_valid IM l (s, input)
‚àß free_constraint IM l (s, input)
composite_valid IM l (s', input)
‚àß free_constraint IM l (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: (let (i, li) := l in
 vvalid (IM i) li (s i, input))
‚àß free_constraint IM l (s, input)
(let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s' i, input))
‚àß free_constraint IM l (s', input)

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: (let (i, li) := l in
 vvalid (IM i) li (s i, input)) ‚àß True
(let (i, li) := l in vvalid (IM i) li (s' i, input))
‚àß True

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: (let (i, li) := l in valid li (s i, input))
‚àß True
(let (i, li) := l in valid li (s' i, input)) ‚àß True

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= projT1 (existT x v): index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: valid v (s x, input) ‚àß True
valid v (s' x, input) ‚àß True

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= x: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: valid v (s x, input) ‚àß True
valid v (s' x, input) ‚àß True

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= x: index
Heq: s x = s' x
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: valid v (s x, input) ‚àß True
valid v (s' x, input) ‚àß True

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= x: index
Heq: s x = s' x
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
H: valid_state_prop Free s
H1: option_valid_message_prop Free input
H2: valid v (s x, input) ‚àß True
valid v (s x, input) ‚àß True

    assumption.
  Qed.

  (* The effect of the transition is also the same *)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
let (dest, output) := vtransition Free l (s, input) in
let (dest', output') :=
  vtransition Free l (s', input) in
output = output' ‚àß dest i = dest' i

output = output' ‚àß dest i = dest' i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

s, s': vstate Free
l: vlabel Free
input: option message
i:= projT1 l: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
let (dest, output) :=
  (let (transition, _) := machine Free in transition)
    l (s, input) in
let (dest', output') :=
  (let (transition, _) := machine Free in transition)
    l (s', input) in
output = output' ‚àß dest i = dest' i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= projT1 (existT x v): index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
let (dest, output) :=
  let (si', om') :=
    vtransition (IM x) v (s x, input) in
  (state_update IM s x si', om') in
let (dest', output') :=
  let (si', om') :=
    vtransition (IM x) v (s' x, input) in
  (state_update IM s' x si', om') in
output = output' ‚àß dest i = dest' i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input: option message
i:= x: index
Heq: s x = s' x
Hprs: valid_state_prop Free s'
s0: state
o: option message
s0 = s0

    reflexivity.
  Qed.

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
ai: vplan_item Free
i:= projT1 (label_a ai): index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s [ai]
let res' := (apply_plan Free s' [ai]).2 in
let res := (apply_plan Free s [ai]).2 in
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' [ai] ‚àß res' i = res i

  (apply_plan Free s [ai]).2 i

  (apply_plan Free s [ai]).1

  (apply_plan Free s' [ai]).1
‚àß (apply_plan Free s' [ai]).2 i =
  (apply_plan Free s [ai]).2 i

IndEqDec: EqDecision index

ai: vplan_item Free
i:= projT1 (label_a ai): index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (let (final, items) :=
     foldr _apply_plan_folder (s, []) (rev [ai]) in
   (rev items, final)).1
finite_valid_trace_from Free s'
  (let (final, items) :=
     foldr _apply_plan_folder (s', []) (rev [ai]) in
   (rev items, final)).1
‚àß (let (final, items) :=
     foldr _apply_plan_folder (s', []) (rev [ai]) in
   (rev items, final)).2 i =
  (let (final, items) :=
     foldr _apply_plan_folder (s, []) (rev [ai]) in
   (rev items, final)).2 i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i:= projT1 label_a: index
Heq: s i = s' i
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (let (final, items) :=
     let (dest, out) :=
       vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).1
finite_valid_trace_from Free s'
  (let (final, items) :=
     let (dest, out) :=
       vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).1
‚àß (let (final, items) :=
     let (dest, out) :=
       vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).2 i =
  (let (final, items) :=
     let (dest, out) :=
       vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).2 i

     let (dest, out) :=
       vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).1
s0: state
o: option message
eq_trans': vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) =
(s0, o)
finite_valid_trace_from Free s'
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s0;
        output := o
      |}], s0).1
‚àß (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s0;
        output := o
      |}], s0).2 i =

       vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
     (dest,
     [{|

        input := input_a;
        destination := dest;
        output := out
      |}]) in
   (rev items, final)).2 i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i:= projT1 label_a: index
Heq: s i = s' i
s1: state
o0: option message
eq_trans: vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) =
(s1, o0)
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message
eq_trans': vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) =
(s0, o)
Htl: finite_valid_trace_from Free s1 []
Ht: input_valid Free label_a (s, input_a)
‚àß transition label_a (s, input_a) = (s1, o0)
input_valid Free label_a (s', input_a)
‚àß transition label_a (s', input_a) = (s0, o)

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index

s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'

(s1, o0)
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message
eq_trans': vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) =
(s0, o)
Htl: finite_valid_trace_from Free s1 []
Hpr_valid: input_valid Free label_a (s, input_a)
Htrans: transition label_a (s, input_a) = (s1, o0)
input_valid Free label_a (s', input_a)
‚àß transition label_a (s', input_a) = (s0, o)

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i:= projT1 label_a: index
Heq: s i = s' i
s1: state
o0: option message

(s1, o0)
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message

(s0, o)

Hpr_valid: input_valid Free label_a (s', input_a)
Htrans: transition label_a (s, input_a) = (s1, o0)
input_valid Free label_a (s', input_a)
‚àß transition label_a (s', input_a) = (s0, o)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i:= projT1 label_a: index
Heq: s i = s' i
s1: state
o0: option message
eq_trans: vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) =
(s1, o0)
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message
eq_trans': vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) =
(s0, o)
Htl: finite_valid_trace_from Free s1 []
Ht: input_valid_transition Free label_a 
  (s, input_a) (s1, o0)
Hrel: let i := projT1 label_a in
s i = s' i
‚Üí valid_state_prop Free s'
  ‚Üí let (dest, output) :=
      vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
    let (dest', output') :=
      vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) in
    output = output' ‚àß dest i = dest' i
s0 i = s1 i

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index

s1: state
o0: option message

(s1, o0)

     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message

(s0, o)

  (s, input_a) (s1, o0)
Hrel: s (projT1 label_a) = s' (projT1 label_a)
‚Üí valid_state_prop Free s'
  ‚Üí let (dest, output) :=
      vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) in
    let (dest', output') :=
      vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) in
    output = output'

      dest' (projT1 label_a)
s0 i = s1 i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i:= projT1 label_a: index

s1: state
o0: option message
eq_trans: vtransition Free label_a (s, input_a) =
(s1, o0)
Hpr: finite_valid_trace_from Free s
  (rev
     [{|
        l := label_a;
        input := input_a;
        destination := s1;
        output := o0
      |}], s1).1
s0: state
o: option message
eq_trans': vtransition Free label_a (s', input_a) =
(s0, o)
Htl: finite_valid_trace_from Free s1 []
Ht: input_valid_transition Free label_a 
  (s, input_a) (s1, o0)
Hrel: o0 = o
‚àß s1 (projT1 label_a) = s0 (projT1 label_a)
s0 (projT1 label_a) = s1 (projT1 label_a)

      intuition.
  Qed.

  (* Transitioning on some index different from <<i>> does not affect
     component i. *)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
ai: composite_plan_item IM
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)
let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s [ai]).2 in
res i = s i

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
ai: composite_plan_item IM
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)
let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s [ai]).2 in
res i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
ai: composite_plan_item IM
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)
(let (final, items) :=
   foldr _apply_plan_folder (s, []) (rev [ai]) in
 (rev items, final)).2 i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
ai: composite_plan_item IM
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)
(let (final, items) :=
   match ai with
   | {| label_a := l'; input_a := input' |} =>
       let (dest, out) :=
         let (i, li) := l' in
         let (si', om') :=
           vtransition (IM i) li (s i, input') in
         (state_update IM s i si', om') in
       (dest,
       [{|
          l := l';
          input := input';
          destination := dest;
          output := out
        |}])
   end in
 (rev items, final)).2 i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
label_a: label
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i
‚â† projT1
    (Plans.label_a
       {|
         label_a := label_a; input_a := input_a
       |})
(let (final, items) :=
   let (dest, out) :=
     let (i, li) := label_a in
     let (si', om') :=
       vtransition (IM i) li (s i, input_a) in
     (state_update IM s i si', om') in
   (dest,
   [{|
      l := label_a;
      input := input_a;
      destination := dest;
      output := out
    |}]) in
 (rev items, final)).2 i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
label_a: label
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i
‚â† projT1
    (Plans.label_a
       {|
         label_a := label_a; input_a := input_a
       |})
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
eq_trans: (let (i, li) := label_a in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, input_a) in
 (state_update IM s i si', om')) = 
(c, o)
(rev
   [{|
      l := label_a;
      input := input_a;
      destination := c;
      output := o
    |}], c).2 i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 label_a
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
eq_trans: (let (i, li) := label_a in
 let (si', om') :=
   vtransition (IM i) li (s i, input_a) in
 (state_update IM s i si', om')) = 
(c, o)
c i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
label_a: _composite_label IM
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† projT1 label_a
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
eq_trans: (let (i, li) := label_a in
 let (si', om') :=
   transition li (s i, input_a) in
 (state_update IM s i si', om')) = 
(c, o)
c i = s i

   transition li (s i, input_a) in
 (state_update IM s i si', om')) = 
(c, o)
c i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† x
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
eq_trans: (let (si', om') :=
   transition v (s x, input_a) in
 (state_update IM s x si', om')) = 
(c, o)
c i = s i

i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† x
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
s0: state
o0: option message
eq_trans: (state_update IM s x s0, o0) = (c, o)
c i = s i

    
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)
input_a: option message
i: index
Hdif: i ‚â† x
c: composite_state IM
o: option message
s0: state
o0: option message
eq_trans: (state_update IM s x s0, o0) = (c, o)
H0: state_update IM s x s0 = c
H1: o0 = o
state_update IM s x s0 i = s i

H1: o0 = o

message, index: Type

s: _composite_state IM
x: index
v: vlabel (IM x)

o0: option message

H0: state_update IM s x s0 = c

i ‚â† x

    assumption.
  Qed.

  (* Same as the previous result, but for multiple transitions. *)

i: index
Hdif: i ‚àâ a_indices
let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s a).2 in
res i = s i

message, index: Type

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: state
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i ‚àâ a_indices
IHa: let a_indices :=
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) in
i ‚àâ a_indices
‚Üí let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s a).2 in
  res i = s i
let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s (a ++ [x])).2 in
res i = s i

res i = s i
 simpl; intuition.

  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) in

‚Üí let res := (composite_apply_plan IM s a).2 in
  res i = s i

res i = s i
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i ‚àâ a_indices
IHa: i ‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚Üí (composite_apply_plan IM s a).2 i = s i
(composite_apply_plan IM s (a ++ [x])).2 i = s i

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i ‚àâ a_indices
IHa: i ‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚Üí (composite_apply_plan IM s a).2 i = s i
(let (aitems, afinal) :=
   composite_apply_plan IM s a in
 let (a'items, a'final) :=
   composite_apply_plan IM afinal [x] in
 (aitems ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i = s i

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i ‚àâ a_indices
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
IHa: i ‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚Üí sa i = s i
(let (a'items, a'final) :=
   composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] in
 (tra ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i = s i

‚Üí sa i = s i
trx: list transition_item

sx i = s i

‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ++
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i
‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ++
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
(composite_apply_plan IM sa [x]).2 i = sa i

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i
‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ++
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM

trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
i ‚â† projT1 (label_a x)

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: i
‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ++
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
contra: i = projT1 (label_a x)
False

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: projT1 (label_a x)
‚àâ List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ++
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
contra: i = projT1 (label_a x)
False


      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
Hdif: ¬¨ (projT1 (label_a x)
   ‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
   ‚à® projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà [projT1 (label_a x)])
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
contra: i = projT1 (label_a x)
False

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
i: index
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa i = s i
contra: i = projT1 (label_a x)
projT1 (label_a x)
‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚à® projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà [projT1 (label_a x)]

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s: _composite_state IM
x: composite_plan_item IM
a: list (composite_plan_item IM)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_a: composite_apply_plan IM s a = (tra, sa)
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_x: composite_apply_plan IM sa [x] = (trx, sx)
IHa: sa (projT1 (label_a x)) = s (projT1 (label_a x))
projT1 (label_a x)
‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚à® projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà [projT1 (label_a x)]

      right; left.
  Qed.

  (* Same as relevant_components_one but for multiple transitions *)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
a: plan Free
a_indices:= List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
let res' := (apply_plan Free s' a).2 in
let res := (apply_plan Free s a).2 in
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí res' i = res i)

Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
let res' := (apply_plan Free s' a).2 in
let res := (apply_plan Free s a).2 in
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí res' i = res i)

    
message, index: Type

li: list index

Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s (a ++ [x])
IHa: let a_indices :=
  List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) in
a_indices ‚äÜ li
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
  ‚Üí let res' := (apply_plan Free s' a).2 in
    let res := (apply_plan Free s a).2 in
    finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
    ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí res' i = res i)
let res' := (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 in
let res := (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 in
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí res' i = res i)

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index

Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li

IHa: List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ‚äÜ li
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
    ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
         i ‚àà li

           (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)

     i ‚àà li

       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
‚àß finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHa: List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ‚äÜ li
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
    ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
         i ‚àà li
         ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
           (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index

Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHa: List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ‚äÜ li

     i ‚àà li

       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index

Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHa: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
  ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
       i ‚àà li

         (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)

     i ‚àà li

       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

           (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHa: List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ‚äÜ li
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
    ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
         i ‚àà li
         ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
           (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)
small: list index
Heqsmall: small =
List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
a_indices ‚äÜ li

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHa: List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a) ‚äÜ li
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
    ‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
         i ‚àà li
         ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
           (apply_plan Free s a).2 i)
small: list index
Heqsmall: small =
List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
e: index
H: e ‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
e ‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a (a ++ [x]))

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li

Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: valid_state_prop Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
‚Üí ‚àÄ ai : vplan_item Free,
    let i := projT1 (label_a ai) in
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i
    ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
        (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]
      ‚Üí let res' :=
          (apply_plan Free
             (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]).2
          in
        let res :=
          (apply_plan Free
             (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]).2 in
        finite_valid_plan_from Free
          (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]
        ‚àß res' i = res i
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: valid_state_prop Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
‚Üí ‚àÄ ai : vplan_item Free,

    (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i

          (apply_plan Free
             (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]).2 in
        finite_valid_plan_from Free
          (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]
        ‚àß res' i = res i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: ‚àÄ ai : vplan_item Free,
  let i := projT1 (label_a ai) in
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 i =
  (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]
    ‚Üí let res' :=
        (apply_plan Free
           (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]).2 in
      let res :=
        (apply_plan Free
           (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]).2 in
      finite_valid_plan_from Free
        (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]
      ‚àß res' i = res i
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index

Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
