Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: valid_state_prop Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
‚Üí ‚àÄ ai : vplan_item Free,
    let i := projT1 (label_a ai) in
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i
    ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
        (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]
      ‚Üí let res' :=
          (apply_plan Free
             (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]).2
          in
        let res :=
          (apply_plan Free
             (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]).2 in
        finite_valid_plan_from Free
          (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]
        ‚àß res' i = res i
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a

        all : intuition.
      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: ‚àÄ ai : vplan_item Free,
  let i := projT1 (label_a ai) in
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 i =
  (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]
    ‚Üí let res' :=
        (apply_plan Free
           (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]).2 in
      let res :=
        (apply_plan Free
           (apply_plan Free s a).2 [ai]).2 in
      finite_valid_plan_from Free
        (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [ai]
      ‚àß res' i = res i
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)


      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)


      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
(apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
  ‚àß (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
       [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
    (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2
       [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
(apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
(apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free

x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li

Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a

‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))

Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free

         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà a_indices
‚Üí projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà a_indices
‚Üí projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà a_indices

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà a_indices
‚Üí projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
projT1 (label_a x)
‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a (a ++ [x]))

        
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà a_indices
‚Üí projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: projT1 (label_a x) ‚àà li
‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x)) =
  (apply_plan Free s a).2
    (projT1 (label_a x))
Hrel: (apply_plan Free s a).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free s' a).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
  ‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
      (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
    ‚àß (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x)) =
      (apply_plan Free 
         (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
        (projT1 (label_a x))
projT1 (label_a x)
‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a a)
‚à® projT1 (label_a x)
  ‚àà List.map projT1 (List.map label_a [x])

        right; left.
      
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrel: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
‚Üí finite_valid_plan_from Free
    (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
  ‚àß (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
       [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
    (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2
       [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x))
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
‚àß (‚àÄ i : index,
     i ‚àà li
     ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' (a ++ [x])).2 i =
       (apply_plan Free s (a ++ [x])).2 i)

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
Hrelind: (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
   [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x))
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' (a ++ [x])
 
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, i ‚àà li ‚Üí s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: ‚àÄ i : index,
  i ‚àà li
  ‚Üí (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
    (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
Hrelind: (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
   [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x))
finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
‚àß finite_valid_plan_from Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
    [x]

        split; intuition.

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
IHaind: (apply_plan Free s' a).2 i =
(apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s' a).2 [x]
Hrelind: (apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s' a).2
   [x]).2 (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
(let (aitems, afinal) := apply_plan Free s' a in
 let (a'items, a'final) :=
   apply_plan Free afinal [x] in
 (aitems ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i =
(let (aitems, afinal) := apply_plan Free s a in
 let (a'items, a'final) :=
   apply_plan Free afinal [x] in
 (aitems ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free
  (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
tra': list transition_item
sa': state
eq_as': apply_plan Free s' a = (tra', sa')
IHaind: (tra', sa').2 i = (apply_plan Free s a).2 i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free (tra', sa').2 [x]
Hrelind: (apply_plan Free (tra', sa').2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free (apply_plan Free s a).2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
(let (a'items, a'final) := apply_plan Free sa' [x] in
 (tra' ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i =
(let (aitems, afinal) := apply_plan Free s a in
 let (a'items, a'final) :=
   apply_plan Free afinal [x] in
 (aitems ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i

sa: state

IHaind: (tra', sa').2 i = (tra, sa).2 i

  (projT1 (label_a x)) =
(apply_plan Free (tra, sa).2 [x]).2
  (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li

 (tra' ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i =
(let (a'items, a'final) := apply_plan Free sa [x] in
 (tra ++ a'items, a'final)).2 i

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_as: apply_plan Free s a = (tra, sa)
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
tra': list transition_item
sa': _composite_state IM
eq_as': apply_plan Free s' a = (tra', sa')
IHaind: sa' i = sa i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa' [x]
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_xsa: apply_plan Free sa [x] = (trx, sx)
trx': list transition_item
sx': _composite_state IM
eq_xsa': apply_plan Free sa' [x] = (trx', sx')
Hrelind: sx' (projT1 (label_a x)) =
sx (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
n: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a x)
Hdiff: ‚àÄ (ai : composite_plan_item IM) (i : index),
  i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)
  ‚Üí let res :=
      (composite_apply_plan IM sa [ai]).2 in
    res i = sa i
sx' i = sx i

          
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_as: apply_plan Free s a = (tra, sa)
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
tra': list transition_item
sa': _composite_state IM
eq_as': apply_plan Free s' a = (tra', sa')
IHaind: sa' i = sa i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa' [x]
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_xsa: apply_plan Free sa [x] = (trx, sx)
trx': list transition_item
sx': _composite_state IM
eq_xsa': apply_plan Free sa' [x] = (trx', sx')
Hrelind: sx' (projT1 (label_a x)) =
sx (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
n: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a x)
Hdiff: let res := (composite_apply_plan IM sa [x]).2
  in
res i = sa i
sx' i = sx i

  in
res i = sa i
Hdiff0: ‚àÄ (ai : composite_plan_item IM) (i : index),
  i ‚â† projT1 (label_a ai)

      (composite_apply_plan IM sa' [ai]).2 in
    res i = sa' i
sx' i = sx i

IndEqDec: EqDecision index

s, s': vstate Free

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index

Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a

sx (projT1 (label_a x))

Hdiff0: (composite_apply_plan IM sa' [x]).2 i = sa' i
(composite_apply_plan IM sa' [x]).2 i =
(composite_apply_plan IM sa [x]).2 i

          
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

s, s': vstate Free

x: vplan_item Free

  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_as: apply_plan Free s a = (tra, sa)
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
tra': list transition_item
sa': _composite_state IM
eq_as': apply_plan Free s' a = (tra', sa')
IHaind: sa' i = sa i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa' [x]
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_xsa: (apply_plan Free sa [x]).2 = (trx, sx).2
trx': list transition_item
sx': _composite_state IM
eq_xsa': (apply_plan Free sa' [x]).2 = (trx', sx').2
Hrelind: sx' (projT1 (label_a x)) =
sx (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
n: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a x)
Hdiff: (composite_apply_plan IM sa [x]).2 i = sa i
Hdiff0: (composite_apply_plan IM sa' [x]).2 i = sa' i
(composite_apply_plan IM sa' [x]).2 i = sa i

          
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Free:= free_composite_vlsm IM: VLSM message
s, s': vstate Free
Hprs': valid_state_prop Free s'
x: vplan_item Free
a: list (vplan_item Free)
a_indices:= List.map projT1
  (List.map label_a (a ++ [x])): list index
li: list index
i: index
Heq: s' i = s i
Hincl: a_indices ‚äÜ li
Hrem: finite_valid_plan_from Free s a
tra: list transition_item
sa: _composite_state IM
eq_as: apply_plan Free s a = (tra, sa)
Hsingle: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa [x]
IHapr: finite_valid_plan_from Free s' a
tra': list transition_item
sa': _composite_state IM
eq_as': apply_plan Free s' a = (tra', sa')
IHaind: sa' i = sa i
Hrelpr: finite_valid_plan_from Free sa' [x]
trx: list transition_item
sx: _composite_state IM
eq_xsa: (apply_plan Free sa [x]).2 = (trx, sx).2
trx': list transition_item
sx': _composite_state IM
eq_xsa': (apply_plan Free sa' [x]).2 = (trx', sx').2
Hrelind: sx' (projT1 (label_a x)) =
sx (projT1 (label_a x))
Hi: i ‚àà li
n: i ‚â† projT1 (label_a x)
Hdiff: (composite_apply_plan IM sa [x]).2 i = sa i
Hdiff0: (composite_apply_plan IM sa' [x]).2 i = sa' i
sa' i = sa i

          assumption.
  Qed.

End composite_plan_properties.

Section empty_composition_properties.

Context {message : Type}
  {index : Type}
  {IndEqDec : EqDecision index}
  (IM : index -> VLSM message)
  (constraint : composite_label IM -> composite_state IM * option message -> Prop)
  (X := composite_vlsm IM constraint)
  (index_listing : list index)
  (finite_index : Listing index_listing)
  (Hempty_index : index_listing = [])
  .


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
i: index
False


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
i: index
False

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
i: index
Hin: In i index_listing
False

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
finite_index: Listing []
i: index
Hin: In i []
False
 contradiction.
Qed.


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
s: composite_state IM
s = `(composite_s0 IM)

s = `(composite_s0 IM)

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
s: composite_state IM
‚àÄ x : index, s x = (`(composite_s0 IM)) x

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
s: composite_state IM
i: index
s i = (`(composite_s0 IM)) i
 elim (empty_composition_no_index i).
Qed.

message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
m: message
s': (state * option message)%type
l: label
False

  elim (empty_composition_no_label l).
Qed.


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ valid_message_prop X m


message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
‚àÄ m : message, ¬¨ valid_message_prop X m

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
m: message
Hm: valid_message_prop X m
False

  
message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message

  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index

False

Hinit: initial_message_prop m
False
 elim (empty_composition_no_initial_message _ Hinit).
  
message, index: Type

  ‚Üí Prop

index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
m: message
Hemit: can_emit X m
False
 elim (empty_composition_no_emit _ Hemit).
Qed.

  elim (empty_composition_no_label l).
Qed.

message, index: Type
IndEqDec: EqDecision index
IM: index ‚Üí VLSM message
constraint: composite_label IM
‚Üí composite_state IM * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
X:= composite_vlsm IM constraint: VLSM message
index_listing: list index
finite_index: Listing index_listing
Hempty_index: index_listing = []
m: message
s': (state * option message)%type
l: label
False

  elim (empty_composition_no_label l).
Qed.

End empty_composition_properties.

Properties of extensionally-equal indexed compositions

If two indexed sets of VLSMs are extensionally-equal, then we can establish a VLSM_full_projection between their compositions with subsumable constraints (and pre-loaded with the same set of messages). 
Section sec_same_IM_full_projection.

Context
  {message : Type}
  `{EqDecision index}
  (IM1 IM2 : index -> VLSM message)
  (Heq : forall i, IM1 i = IM2 i)
  .

Definition same_IM_label_rew
  (l1 : composite_label IM1)
  : composite_label IM2 :=
  existT (projT1 l1) (same_VLSM_label_rew (Heq (projT1 l1)) (projT2 l1)).

Definition same_IM_state_rew
  (s1 : composite_state IM1)
  : composite_state IM2 :=
  fun i => same_VLSM_state_rew (Heq i) (s1 i).

Section pre_loaded_constrained.

Context
  (constraint1 : composite_label IM1 -> composite_state IM1 * option message -> Prop)
  (constraint2 : composite_label IM2 -> composite_state IM2 * option message -> Prop)
  (constraint_projection
    : forall s1, valid_state_prop (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm (free_composite_vlsm IM1)) s1 ->
      forall l1 om, constraint1 l1 (s1,om) ->
    constraint2 (same_IM_label_rew l1) (same_IM_state_rew s1, om))
  (seed : message -> Prop)
  .


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_full_projection
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1)
     seed)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2)
     seed) same_IM_label_rew same_IM_state_rew


message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
VLSM_full_projection
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1)
     seed)
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2)
     seed) same_IM_label_rew same_IM_state_rew

  
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
om: option message
Hv: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) l
  (s, om)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed) om
vvalid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2)
     seed) (same_IM_label_rew l)
  (same_IM_state_rew s, om)
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

  valid_state_prop

       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label

      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
om: option message
s': state
om': option message
H: input_valid_transition
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) l
  (s, om) (s', om')
vtransition
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2)
     seed) (same_IM_label_rew l)
  (same_IM_state_rew s, om) =
(same_IM_state_rew s', om')

  ‚Üí Prop

     seed) (same_IM_state_rew l)

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop

  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)

s: state

  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) s

  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) om

Hc: constraint1 l (s, om)

  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed) om
valid_state_prop
  (mk_vlsm
     (machine
        (pre_loaded_vlsm
           (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed))) s

      assumption.
    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
om: option message
Hs: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) s
Hom: option_valid_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) om
Hv: composite_valid IM1 l (s, om)
Hc: constraint2 (same_IM_label_rew l)
  (same_IM_state_rew s, om)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
HomY: option_valid_message_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed) om
vvalid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2)
     seed) (same_IM_label_rew l)
  (same_IM_state_rew s, om)

li: vlabel (IM1 i)
s: state
om, om': option message
si'1: state
Ht1: vtransition (IM1 i) li (s i, om) = (si'1, om')
j: index
state_update IM2 (same_IM_state_rew s) i
  (same_VLSM_state_rew (Heq i) si'1) j =
same_VLSM_state_rew (Heq j)
  (state_update IM1 s i si'1 j)

    
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
i: index
li: vlabel (IM1 i)
s: state
om, om': option message
si'1: state
Ht1: vtransition (IM1 i) li (s i, om) = (si'1, om')
j: index
e: i = j
state_update IM2 (same_IM_state_rew s) i
  (same_VLSM_state_rew (Heq i) si'1) j =
same_VLSM_state_rew (Heq j)
  (state_update IM1 s i si'1 j)

Hv: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) l
  (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
i: index
Him: initial_message_prop m
vinitial_message_prop (IM2 i) m
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) l
  (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
i: index
Him: initial_message_prop m
Hm: vinitial_message_prop (IM2 i) m
‚àÉ mi : vinitial_message (IM2 i), `mi = m

vinitial_message_prop (IM2 i) m
 eapply same_VLSM_initial_message_preservation; eauto.

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index
IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
constraint1: composite_label IM1
‚Üí composite_state IM1 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint2: composite_label IM2
‚Üí composite_state IM2 * option message
  ‚Üí Prop
constraint_projection: ‚àÄ s1 : state,
  valid_state_prop
    (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
       (free_composite_vlsm
          IM1)) s1
  ‚Üí ‚àÄ (l1 : composite_label
              IM1) (om : 
                    option
                      message),
      constraint1 l1 (s1, om)
      ‚Üí constraint2
          (same_IM_label_rew
             l1)
          (same_IM_state_rew
             s1, om)
seed: message ‚Üí Prop
l: label
s: state
m: message
Hv: input_valid
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 constraint1) seed) l
  (s, Some m)
HsY: valid_state_prop
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 constraint2) seed)
  (same_IM_state_rew s)
i: index
Him: initial_message_prop m
Hm: vinitial_message_prop (IM2 i) m
`(m ‚Üæ Hm) = m
 reflexivity.
Qed.

End pre_loaded_constrained.

IM1, IM2: index ‚Üí VLSM message
Heq: ‚àÄ i : index, IM1 i = IM2 i
VLSM_full_projection
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM1))
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM2)) same_IM_label_rew
  same_IM_state_rew

       (free_composite_vlsm IM1)) sX trX

     (free_composite_vlsm IM1)) s0

  (same_IM_state_rew s0, om)
 exact I. 
message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

          (free_constraint IM1)) seed)

  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm

message, index: Type
EqDecision0: EqDecision index

tr1: list transition_item
Hproj: VLSM_full_projection
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM1 (free_constraint IM1))
     (Œª _ : message, True))
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 (free_constraint IM2))
     (Œª _ : message, True)) same_IM_label_rew
  same_IM_state_rew
Htr1: finite_valid_trace
  (pre_loaded_vlsm
     (composite_vlsm IM2 (free_constraint IM2))
     (Œª _ : message, True))
  (same_IM_state_rew s1)
  (VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     Hproj tr1)
Heq2: VLSM_eq
  (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
     (free_composite_vlsm IM2))
  (pre_loaded_vlsm (free_composite_vlsm IM2)
     (Œª _ : message, True))
finite_valid_trace
  (mk_vlsm
     (machine
        (pre_loaded_vlsm (free_composite_vlsm IM2)
           (Œª _ : message, True))))
  (same_IM_state_rew s1)
  (pre_VLSM_full_projection_finite_trace_project
     (type
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
           (free_composite_vlsm IM1)))
     (type
        (pre_loaded_with_all_messages_vlsm
           (free_composite_vlsm IM2)))
     same_IM_label_rew same_IM_state_rew tr1)

  assumption.
Qed.

End sec_same_IM_full_projection.

Arguments same_IM_label_rew {_ _ _ _} _ _ : assert.
Arguments same_IM_state_rew {_ _ _ _} _ _ _ : assert.
